title: Please can someone explain how the payments procedure is after you get selected in counselling?
content: I got 1.4k rank in pessat, wanted AI ML in RR campus all CSE in EC campus. Wanted to know what was the process after you got selected through counselling.

comments.body: In the email which they sent me on 2nd June, they told that we gotta carry 4 DD(Demand Draft) with us to be eligible for counselling. So basically gotta pay all fee at the start of the year.

On the counseling day you got to bring the dds mentioned , they will verify all your details and dds and allow you inside on the d-day . The ranks starting from 1 are called one by one and asked which course and campus they want . You will submit the dds only when you confirm your seat .
If you don't select a seat there is no need to submit any dd (not even the 10k one).
Last year they cut 2k per day for me and my friend,  till the day we studied there
i see, so its kinda refundable
